name: telekinetically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses telekinesis (= the ability to move objects, or to make them change shape, using only the power of the mind): He claimed that he had lifted the pack of cards from the table telekinetically. If I concentrate, I believe I can turn off the lights telekinetically from where I am sitting.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the video she seemed to be using her mind power to telekinetically pick up fruit. The film is about a young girl who acquires the ability to start fires telekinetically. Several times he attempted but failed to telekinetically move the coins.
